title-section.name: Viktor Kopan.
title-section.description: I specialize in bringing user-friendly and responsive user interfaces to life. I will be glad to launch or improve your product

about-section.title: About Me
about-section.description: I am a front-end developer with over a year of experience. I like to create convenient and beautiful interfaces. The result of my work brings me real pleasure. I am always open to new knowledge and technologies. I would love to gain experience with Next.js, GraphQL and React Native. In my spare time from development, I enjoy playing the guitar, doing CrossFit and riding a bike. I believe that my personal interests inspire me to be creative and help me find non-standard solutions in my work.
about-section.skills-title: Here are the technologies I work with:

omstu.description: Bachelor. Energy Institute. Power industry and electrical engineering. Although it was not specifically intended for future work, but here I gained knowledge about the basic concepts in programming and in the end I realized that my interest lies in web development.
